EmailTemplate.subject: How to Delegate Access to Your Squarespace Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
To help us assist you with your Squarespace domain, please follow the steps below to grant us access:
1.Open the Permissions & Ownership panel in your Squarespace account. 2. Click Invite Contributor (or Invite Domain Manager if applicable). 3. In the Invite window, enter the following details: - Name: Luxury Presence - Email: domainaccess@luxurypresence.com - Under Global, turn on the Administrator toggle 4. Click Invite to send the invitation.
This article from our Help Center walks you through the steps in more detail: https://luxurypresence.my.site.com/helpcenter/s/article/How-to-Share-Access-to-Your-Squarespace-Account
Once you've invited us, kindly let us know, and we’ll take it from there!
If you have any questions or need assistance with this process, don’t hesitate to reach out.
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
